alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:52AM EST until January 10 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Surry and Yadkin counties in northwest North Carolina. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff flowing into the Yadkin River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 349 AM EST, reports of at least a dozen roads closed due to flooding persist across the warned area, especially in Yadkin County. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Chinquapin Creek, Cobb Creek, Ararat River, Beaverdam Creek, Cody Creek, Camp Creek, Bull Creek, Arnold Branch, Cranberry Creek and Beaver Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elkin, Fairview, Yadkinville, Jonesville, Dobson, Pilot Mountain and Boonville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
